Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1 is that it has been deployed on devnet for testing purposes. The mainnet deployment timeline remains uncertain due to the ongoing development process.


Several tasks were accomplished, including implementing a new version of the Beacon Chain and updating the execution engine in the Execution Layer. Additionally, work was done on improving the performance of the CL-EL interface.


The team is working towards completing Phase 1 implementation for devnet testing before moving forward with mainnet deployment.
